name: St. Vincent de Paul Society
description: SVDPS's mission is to offer hope and service on a direct person-to-person basis, working to break the cycles of homelessness and domestic violence. For Survivors of Domestic Violence: Riley Center Services 24-Hour Support Line: (415)-255-0165 For English, please call (415) 757 – 6595 For Spanish, please call (415) 757 – 6490 We may also provide translation for other languages over the phone. For more information, follow this link: https://svdp-sf.org/domestic-violence/
